remarks: Value of the structure replacement function at an untouched index. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
statement:
setsid.e $e |- E = Slot ( E ` ndx ) $.
setsnid.n $e |- ( E ` ndx ) =/= D $.
setsnid $p |- ( E ` W ) = ( E ` ( W sSet <. D , C >. ) ) $.
